description:
Microsoft Excel just might be the ultimate piece of software ever developed. Enormous portion of the economy rely on the program, and becoming skilled at Excel has become a license to grow in the business. So while there are a lot of basic tricks that you have to know, there are also a few tricks that will set you head and shoulders above the competition.

This course explains powerful tools that have become engrained in business processes worldwide. Businesses will continue to use Excel as a primary tool for diverse functions and applications ranging from IT projects to company anniversaries and party times

The industries and functional specializations such as Information Technology, Administration, accounting, Finance, Marketing, Operations, Human Resource Management, Health care benefit the most by using Excel.
title: Tips and Tricks on MS Excel 2013 from Mr. Biz Analyst
